ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 4
ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: The Animated Celebration Presents The Scheimer Barrier
ComicInfo.Summary: Mad scientist Fontana forces Kirk and company to battle other beloved Federation crew members from The Next Generation all the way to Lower Decks in the brawling death match of the millennium! How can our heroes possibly survive this horrifying gladiator game when the referee has limitless godlike powers? Find out in the thrilling conclusion of this comic book celebrating the 50-year anniversary of Star Trek: The Animated Series.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:59:06. [CVDB1019741]
ComicInfo.Characters: Arex, Brad Boimler, Christopher Pike, D'Vana Tendi, Data, Deanna Troi, Ellen Landry, Fontana, James T. Kirk, Jean-Luc Picard, Khan Noonien Singh, Kurros, M'Ress, Michael Burnham, Nyota Uhura, Quark, Saru, Seven of Nine, Spock, Tuvix, William Riker, Worf
ComicInfo.Teams: Borg, Cerritos Crew, Enterprise Crew, Enterprise D Crew, Starfleet, Tribbles, USS Discovery Crew, USS Voyager Crew
